page.title: 16HOUSING
page.content: My house is owned by the council but we are hoping to buy it from them very soon. It is semi_detached. It is up a hill and the road is called Windmill Road because there used to be a windmill at the top of the hill. There is none of the building left. We have three bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs and two rooms downstairs. We have a big back garden where my sister and I play. The front garden is small. We have a small kitchen and a big sitting room. We have a gas fire not a coal fire to keep us warm in the winter. We have a very tiny hall. My house is with a lot more houses, twenty seven, that are the same. I live on the even side of the road. My house is built of red bricks and the roof is grey slates.
